title: Changing patcher to OCE
body:
Hi guys,

I have noticed when I download the new patch we get a message from riot saying "After installing, the login screen region may not correctly default to your region. Please select the region in which your account was created in order to successfully login". I created my account in NA so when i select the live patcher it comes up as NA in the settings on the client. It did used to say OCE before. Does anyone know how can I change it as it only comes up with 2 options "Live (NA) or PBE. Thanks all!
